explanation: There are multiple positive sentiments regarding BTC in the opinions, including mentions of significant buying activity ($14B BTC buy), expectations of breaking all-time highs, and general bullishness on BTC's resilience and upward trend. While a few comments mention shorting or a bearish outlook, the prevailing attitude is optimism, with statements encouraging long positions, holding, and citing large investments entering the market. One participant notes retail shorts are piling up, suggesting a possible short squeeze. The technical mentions (EMA support, holding up well, anticipated pump) further reinforce the bullish bias.
